action: Tap 'Close button to dismiss language selection overlay'
observation: I see a sign-up page with language selection overlays still visible. There are multiple language dropdowns/overlays open that need to be closed. I can see the main sign-up form underneath with email input and sign-up buttons. I need to close these language overlays first to access the actual sign-up form.
reasoning: As an elderly user, I find these overlapping language menus very confusing and overwhelming. I need to close them to get to the simple sign-up form. I can see a close button (element 23) that should dismiss these overlays.
ux_issues: Multiple overlapping language selection menus are very confusing for elderly users
No clear way to dismiss all overlays at once
Complex interface with too many options displayed simultaneously
